New Graph Environment Version 0.0.1 2021-06-24 Acknowledgement Modern civilization has a long journey ahead to acknowledge and address the historic and ongoing impacts of colonialism that have resulted in harm to ecosystems on Turtle Island. That harm naturally extends to the cultures and livelihoods of those that have lived in harmony with the land for many thousands of years.
